mapper.insert: insert into ${tableName} (id, error_code, error_message, error_stack_trace, request_url, request_params, login_user_account, create_time) values (#{exception.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{exception.errorCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{exception.errorMessage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{exception.errorStackTrace,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{exception.requestUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{exception.requestParams,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{exception.loginUserAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{exception.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
